com.camerontec.util.logsreplication.client

Class LogsReplicationClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponentWithName
      • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponentWithLogger
        • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponentWithLifeCycle
          • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponent
            • com.camerontec.util.logsreplication.client.LogsReplicationClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IManagedHostsAccessor, IHasLifeCycle, IHasName, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanNameAware

    public class LogsReplicationClient
extends BaseComponent
implements IManagedHostsAccessor
    Entry point for the logs replication client.

    Entry point for the logs replication client. The client may be started programatically via an api call or it may operate standalone. For standalone operation a main method is provided.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  LogsReplicationClient.ReplicationClientBeanServerScope
      Used to specify whether beans generated by the client are registered with the platform mbean server or a private (non platform) mbean server.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LogsReplicationClient

        public LogsReplicationClient(IExtendedMBeanServer replicationClientMBeanServer,
                             IExtendedMBeanServer cascadeTargetMBeanServer,
                             LocalLoggerListener localLoggerListener,
                             String homeDirectory,
                             int fileWriteBlockSize,
                             int connectionManagerListenPortRangeStart,
                             int connectionManagerListenPortRangeEnd,
                             String connectionManagerBindAddress,
                             int connectionDelayLimit,
                             int socketReceiveBufferSize,
                             String ownerId)
        Constructor. This form of the constructor should be used by those clients that perform their own cascading of beans from a remote mbean server to a local one. In addition with this constructor the beans exposed by this client are registered into the local platform mbean server.
        Parameters:
        replicationClientMBeanServer - MBeanServer for the logs replication client.
        cascadeTargetMBeanServer - MBeanServer for the cascade target.
        localLoggerListener - The local logger listener
        homeDirectory - The home directory of the local replicated files.
        fileWriteBlockSize - The file write block size.
        connectionManagerListenPortRangeStart - The start of the connection manager listen port range.
        connectionManagerListenPortRangeEnd - The end of the connection manager listen port range.
        connectionManagerBindAddress - The local address the connection manager will bind to. If empty all addresses will be bound.
        connectionDelayLimit - The connection delay limit.
        socketReceiveBufferSize - The socket receive buffer size.
        ownerId - The id of component owning this LogsReplicationClient

      • LogsReplicationClient

        public LogsReplicationClient(String replicationClientMBeanServiceUrl,
                             LogsReplicationClient.ReplicationClientBeanServerScope scope,
                             String[] loggerEndpoints,
                             String homeDirectory,
                             int fileWriteBlockSize,
                             int connectionManagerListenPortRangeStart,
                             int connectionManagerListenPortRangeEnd,
                             String connectionManagerBindAddress,
                             int connectionDelayLimit,
                             int socketReceiveBufferSize,
                             String ownerId)
        Constructor. This form of the constructor can typically be invoked by standalone clients. With this constructor clients can specify the remote mbean servers with loggers that need cascading. The beans exposed by this replication client may also be exported to a private mbean server or to the platform mbean server.
        Parameters:
        replicationClientMBeanServiceUrl - The JMX Service URL of the replication client.
        scope - Specifies whether beans are exported to the platform mbean server or a private mbean server.
        loggerEndpoints - The logger end points to cascade.
        homeDirectory - The home directory of the local replicated files.
        fileWriteBlockSize - The file write block size.
        connectionManagerListenPortRangeStart - The start of the connection manager listen port range
        connectionManagerListenPortRangeEnd - The end of the connection manager listen port range
        connectionManagerBindAddress - The connection manager bind address. If empty all address will be bound to.
        connectionDelayLimit - The connection delay limit.
        socketReceiveBufferSize - The socket receive buffer size.
        ownerId - The id of component owning this LogsReplicationClient

      • LogsReplicationClient

        public LogsReplicationClient(String replicationClientMBeanServiceUrl,
                             LogsReplicationClient.ReplicationClientBeanServerScope scope,
                             Set<ManagedHost> managedHosts,
                             String homeDirectory,
                             int fileWriteBlockSize,
                             int connectionManagerListenPortRangeStart,
                             int connectionManagerListenPortRangeEnd,
                             String connectionManagerBindAddress,
                             int connectionDelayLimit,
                             int socketReceiveBufferSize,
                             String ownerId)
        Constructor. This form of the constructor can typically be invoked by standalone clients. With this constructor clients can specify the remote mbean servers with loggers that need cascading. The beans exposed by this replication client may also be exported to a private mbean server or to the platform mbean server.
        Parameters:
        replicationClientMBeanServiceUrl - The JMX Service URL of the replication client.
        scope - Specifies whether beans are exported to the platform mbean server or a private mbean server.
        managedHosts - The end points to cascade.
        homeDirectory - The home directory of the local replicated files.
        fileWriteBlockSize - The file write block size.
        connectionManagerListenPortRangeStart - The start of the connection manager listen port range
        connectionManagerListenPortRangeEnd - The end of the connection manager listen port range
        connectionManagerBindAddress - The connection manager bind address. If empty all address will be bound to.
        connectionDelayLimit - The connection delay limit.
        socketReceiveBufferSize - The socket receive buffer size.
        ownerId - The id of component owning this LogsReplicationClient
